title: What happens to my parents if I don't go to school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depending on where you live, they will likely get charged with negligence and you will be removed from their care. The severity would depend on the reason why you didn't attend school. Whether it is because they couldn't afford it or they were purposefully keeping you out. If you are being homeschooled they would have to legally prove it through documentation, keeping up to standards, etc. If it is found to be of your oen wrongdoing, i.e. you bunking school, you will probably receive a stern punishment and warning and your parents will just receive a fine and warning. If it is a repeated offence you will be sent to a correctional faculty.

Well by law you are required to, meaning by extension your parents are legally required to send you to school or homeschool you. If you were found to be truant enough times your parents would be required to have a court hearing, probably fined, it's a whole legal thing
